name: @codex-protocol/eslint-config-vue
description: An eslint config for all Codex Protocol projects using Vue & Babel.

scripts.bump-version: npm version patch -m "Bumps version to %s" && npm publish
scripts.bump-minor-version: npm version minor -m "Bumps version to %s" && npm publish
scripts.bump-major-version: npm version major -m "Bumps version to %s" && npm publish
